New Records: Australia recorded 194 balls of spin in a men's ODI, a record for the team
Key Match Events: Ben Duckett scored his second ODI hundred
Harry Brook scored 72 and took seven sixes
Travis Head scored 58 and took 4 wickets for 28 runs
England collapsed from 309/1 to 309/8, losing 7 wickets for 0 runs
Australia won the match by 49 runs under the DLS method
Pre-Game Insights: Ricky Ponting said Australia would rate a series win very highly given the challenges within the squad
Post-Match Reflections: Phil Salt set the tone in the opening over with three boundaries off Mitchell Starc
England's collapse was due to the spinners, led by Adam Zampa and Travis Head
Ben Duckett praised the strong batting foundation of England
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rain interrupted play and Australia was awarded the match under the DLS method
Australia took the one-day series in Bristol
